sentences.sContent: This displacement, which places the "elegant" name on the plebeian and the rustic name on the aristocrat, is nothing else than an eddy of equality.
sentences.sContent_eng: This displacement, which places the "elegant" name on the plebeian and the rustic name on the aristocrat, is nothing else than an eddy of equality.
sentences.sCn: “高雅”的名字移到平民身上，村野的名字移到贵人身上，那样的交流只能说是平等思想激荡的后果。

sentences.sContent: As a result the economy lagged the political and civic development of the republic, and there were hostilities which broke out periodically between the patrician and plebeian classes.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a result the economy lagged the political and civic development of the republic, and there were hostilities which broke out periodically between the patrician and plebeian classes.
sentences.sCn: 这使得经济拖累了共和国政治和市民的发展，贵族阶级和平民阶级之间的敌对行为周期性爆发。

words.tran: 军官学校的最下级生；陆海军官校的一年级生；平民

trans.tranOther: an insulting word for someone who is from a low social class
